>
[Antagonize](/Feats.aspx?ID=1522) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Swashbuckler" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=321" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 88 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your taunts and threats earn your foes ire. When you successfully [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53) a creature, its [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) condition can't decrease to less than 1 at the end of its turn until it either uses a hostile action against you or can no longer observe or sense you for at least 1 round.
